item.title: Finite Fields - Number Theory
item.description:
This blog post covers one of the most important Mathematical Structures for Cryptography- Fields. It is used in both Symmetric and Asymmetric key Cryptography.

This blog post gives a basic introduction to Finite Fields and arithmetic operations on it, but I hope the purpose of it is served- to make people, who donâ€™t have basic knowledge about this, understand a few upcoming CTF write-ups, that are based on Finite Fields.
